DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study SPARC001 Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adult , male female volunteer , 18 55 year age Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤30 kg/m2 screen Female subject must negative serum pregnancy test Medically healthy basis medical history physical examination Females pregnant , lactating , likely become pregnant study Lifetime history and/or recent evidence alcohol History hypersensitivity hydrocodone , acetaminophen component test reference formulation Subjects condition opioid contraindicate
